warning_message: Room temperature thawing allows bacteria to multiply to dangerous levels
safe_alternative: Thaw in refrigerator, under cold running water, or in microwave

warning_message: Washing raw chicken spreads bacteria up to 3 feet around your sink

warning_message: Low-acid foods (vegetables, meat) require pressure canning to prevent botulism
safe_alternative: Use tested pressure canning recipes from USDA or extension services

warning_message: Cross-contamination from raw meat causes foodborne illness
safe_alternative: Use separate cutting boards for raw meat and ready-to-eat foods

warning_message: Pre-stuffing poultry creates ideal conditions for bacterial growth
safe_alternative: Stuff turkey just before cooking, or cook stuffing separately
